allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: replace DateTime.Now with DateTime.UtcNow for PostgreSQL compatibility

PostgreSQL requires UTC timestamps for ''timestamp with time zone'' columns.
Changed all DateTime.Now to DateTime.UtcNow across the entire codebase to
fix "Cannot write DateTime with Kind=Local" errors.
